abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of this plan are: 1) to
            ensure that project affected people (PAP) are compensated
            for any losses of land, vegetation and crops and buildings
            and structures; and 2) to ensure that the income level and
            the living standard of the PAP shall not be reduced, but
            rather improved. To achieve this objective, Perusahaan Umum
            Listrik Negara (PLN) is committed to do the following: 1) to
            ensure that all PAPs, both landowners, formally owners and
            "land encroachers", and non-landowners are
            compensated at replacement value for all assets; 2) to
            ensure that for land compensation, if any, will be completed
            before the start of actual construction work; 3) to ensure
            that couseling, technical assistance and credit facilities
            will be made available to those wishing to engage in small
            business and other trade activities; and 4) to ensure that
            education and training will be provided in vocational
            training school if desired by the affected people.
